name: Suprem Fighting Mans
description:
The year is 20XX

Once again it is time for the greatest fighting tournament, OF ALL TIME!

 THE SUPREM FIGHTING MANS TOURNAMENT!!!1!

Suprem Fighting Mans is a 2D local 2 player fighting game, featuring an isometric camera angle. That's a lot of adjectives. Now here's some statistics!

Suprem Fighting Mans includes:

- 15 unique playable characters!

- 5 unique stages to choose and BATTLE on!

- USER DETERMINED hours of fun!
